seed.description: The seed for the issuer address in hex or base64 used to fund the minting, or start with ! to read environment variable.

issuer.description: The identity of the NFT issuer, or start with ! to read environment variable.

wallet-address-index.description: The wallet address index to use for storing the NFT.

immutable-json.description: A JSON file to read which includes the immutable data for the NFT.

mutable-json.description: A JSON file to read which includes the mutable data for the NFT.

id.description: The id for the NFT in urn format.

seed.description: The seed for the issuer address in hex or base64 used to fund the burning, or start with ! to read environment variable.

id.description: The id for the NFT in urn format.

seed.description: The seed for the issuer address in hex or base64 used to fund the transfer, or start with ! to read environment variable.

id.description: The id for the NFT in urn format.

recipient-identity.description: The identity of the NFT issuer, or start with ! to read environment variable.

recipient-address.description: The address of the NFT recipient, or start with ! to read environment variable.

connector.description: The connector to use for the NFT operation.

network.description: The network to use for the NFT operation.

node.description: The url for the node endpoint, or an environment variable name containing the url.
